trans-unit.source: Abstract class used internally by the WPF XAML compiler to support the use of internal types.
trans-unit.target: WPF XAML 編譯器在內部用來支援使用內部類型的抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: The InternalTypeHelper class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: InternalTypeHelper 類別不適合使用的 WPF XAML 標記編譯器以外的任何項目。

trans-unit.source: When compiling a XAML file, you can use public types, but you can also use internal types subject to the same limitations that exist on code access to internal types.
trans-unit.target: 當編譯 XAML 檔案時，您可以使用公用類型，但您也可以使用受限於相同限制存在的內部型別上的程式碼存取的內部型別。

trans-unit.source: InternalTypeHelper enables support of internal access level types for markup.
trans-unit.target: InternalTypeHelper 啟用之標記的內部存取層級類型的支援。

trans-unit.source: This involves the compiler creating a generated class that derives from InternalTypeHelper and implements its members.
trans-unit.target: 這牽涉到編譯器建立的產生的類別，衍生自 InternalTypeHelper 並實作其成員。

trans-unit.source: The generated class exists in a security and access context such that only the same assembly or other assemblies specifically attributed for shared internal access can reference the generated class and thus the internal types.
trans-unit.target: 產生的類別存在安全性和存取內容中，產生的類別，因此內部型別可以參考相同組件或特別屬性化共用內部存取其他組件。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived (generated) class, attaches an event handler delegate to an internal event.
trans-unit.target: （產生） 的衍生類別中覆寫，附加事件處理常式委派至內部的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>類別不適用於 WPF XAML 標記編譯器以外的任何項目所。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>

trans-unit.source: The event information for the event (CLR reflection information).
trans-unit.target: 事件 （CLR 反映資訊） 的事件資訊。

trans-unit.source: The target where the handler is attached.
trans-unit.target: 目標附加的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived (generated) class, creates an event delegate referencing a non-public handler method.
trans-unit.target: （產生） 的衍生類別中覆寫，會建立參考非公用的處理常式方法的事件委派。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>類別不適用於 WPF XAML 標記編譯器以外的任何項目所。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>的委派。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The target where the handler is attached.
trans-unit.target: 目標附加的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式實作的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The delegate reference.
trans-unit.target: 委派的參考。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived (generated) class, creates an instance of an internal type.
trans-unit.target: （產生） 的衍生類別中覆寫，會建立內部類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>類別不適用於 WPF XAML 標記編譯器以外的任何項目所。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to create.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>來建立。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Culture specific information.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The created instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived (generated) class, gets the value of an internal property on the target object
trans-unit.target: （產生） 的衍生類別中覆寫，請在目標物件上取得內部屬性的值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>類別不適用於 WPF XAML 標記編譯器以外的任何項目所。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>

trans-unit.source: Property information for the property to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之屬性的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the desired property value.
trans-unit.target: 保存所需的屬性值的物件。

trans-unit.source: Culture specific information.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性特定資訊。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived (generated) class, sets the value on an internal property on the target object.
trans-unit.target: （產生） 的衍生類別中覆寫，設定目標物件上的內部屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper> class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>類別不適用於 WPF XAML 標記編譯器以外的任何項目所。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.InternalTypeHelper>

trans-unit.source: Property information for the property to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定之屬性的屬性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the desired property value.
trans-unit.target: 保存所需的屬性值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的值。

trans-unit.source: Culture specific information.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性特定資訊。
